se.vgregion.dao.domain.patterns.repository.inmemory
Class AbstractInMemoryRepository<T extends Entity<ID>,ID extends Serializable>

java.lang.Object
  se.vgregion.dao.domain.patterns.repository.inmemory.AbstractInMemoryRepository<T,ID>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<T,ID>
public abstract class AbstractInMemoryRepository<T extends Entity<ID>,ID extends Serializable>
extends Object
implements Repository<T,ID>

Abstract in-memory repository. Stores entities in a ConcurrentHashMap

Refresh the state of the instance from the storage, overwriting changes made to the entity, if any. Not supported by the in-memory repository
